FuncDef: This command creates confederation autonomous systems within an AS.

ParaDef.Info: The confederation AS number expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 65535.
The AS number of members that are part of the confederation, expressed as a decimal integer. Up to 15 members per confed-as-num can be configured. Values-1 to 65535.

ExtraInfo: Default: no confederation - no confederations are defined.
